survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Renewable Energy Providers Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather insights on consumer preferences, satisfaction levels, and decision-making factors related to renewable energy providers.

questions.question_text: Which renewable energy provider are you currently using?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture providers not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which renewable energy provider are you currently using?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current renewable energy provider?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'Other' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current renewable energy provider?
script.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'Other' in Q1

questions.question_text: What factors influenced your choice of renewable energy provider? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse decision factors.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What factors influenced your choice of renewable energy provider? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your current renewable energy provider to others?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'Other' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a standard NPS-like scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your current renewable energy provider to others?
script.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'Other' in Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see from your renewable energy provider?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see from your renewable energy provider?

questions.question_text: How important is the use of renewable energy sources to you when choosing an energy provider?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How important is the use of renewable energy sources to you when choosing an energy provider?

questions.question_text: Have you ever switched renewable energy providers?
questions.client_notes: Binary question to filter for follow-up questions.

script.question_text: Have you ever switched renewable energy providers?

questions.question_text: What was the primary reason for switching renewable energy providers?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture reasons not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What was the primary reason for switching renewable energy providers?

questions.question_text: How do you primarily interact with your renewable energy provider?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture additional interaction methods.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: How do you primarily interact with your renewable energy provider?

questions.question_text: What additional services or features would you like your renewable energy provider to offer?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.
